content.rendered:
[et_pb_section bb_built=”1″][et_pb_row][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.19.10″]

There will also be a reality show be filmed during the event. There will be multiple film crews who follow several contestants’ journey and their drama to the finish line. Since the show will be recruited globally, the reality show should be aired on Connect TV and Amazon Prime, so it can be seen globally. The music will be for sale on iTunes, and streamed on various platforms such as Spotify & Apple Music.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
